string.text:
A modern semi-automatic pistol known for its rotating barrel action, which enhances accuracy and reduces recoil. Designed for military, law enforcement, and civilian use, it features a lightweight polymer frame, ambidextrous controls, and modular grip options for improved ergonomics. Its combination of durability, smooth operation, and adaptability makes it a reliable choice for self-defense and tactical applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Italy
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Fabbrica d'Armi Pietro Beretta
Rechamber the weapon to use .45 ACP.
